Uses of Package
cycling

  • Classes in cycling used by cycling
    Class
    Description
    DuplicatedResultException
    Each rider can only have a single result in a race.
    IDNotRecognisedException
    Thrown when attempting to use an ID that does not exit in the system.
    IllegalNameException
    Thrown when attempting to assign a race name already in use in the system.
    InvalidCheckpointsException
    Each race result should contains the times for each segment (mountain and sprint) within a stage, plus the start time and the finish time.
    InvalidLengthException
    Thrown when attempting to assign a race length null or less than 5 (kilometres).
    InvalidLocationException
    Thrown when attempting to assign a location outside the bounds of the stage, i.e.
    InvalidNameException
    Thrown when attempting to assign a race name null, empty or having more than the system limit of characters.
    InvalidStageStateException
    Thrown when attempting to perform an action within a stage that is incompatible with its current state.
    InvalidStageTypeException
    Thrown when attempting to add segments (sprints or mountains) to a time-trial stage.
    NameNotRecognisedException
    Thrown when attempting to use a name that does not exit in the system.
    SegmentType
    This enum is used to represent the segment types within stages on road races.
    StageType
    This enum is used to represent the stage types on road races.
